<<<<<<< HEAD
Three sermons vpon the Passion, Resurrection and Ascension of Our Sauior preached at Oxford, by Barten Holyday, now archdeacon of Oxford. Holyday, Barten, 1593-1661.
[10], 108, [2] p.
Printed by William Stansby for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be sold at his shop at Saint Austines Gate in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1626.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. The component sermons each have divisional title pages; pagination and register are continuous. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
